java/liquibase/change/custom/CustomChangeWrapper.java

00001 package liquibase.change.custom;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.AbstractChange;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.exception.CustomChangeException;
00008 import liquibase.exception.RollbackImpossibleException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import liquibase.util.ObjectUtil;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.*;
00015 
00023 public class CustomChangeWrapper extends AbstractChange {
00024 
00025     private CustomChange customChange;
00026     private String className;
00027     private SortedSet<String> params = new TreeSet<String>();
00028     private Map<String, String> paramValues = new HashMap<String, String>();
00029     private ClassLoader classLoader;
00030 
00031     public CustomChangeWrapper() {
00032         super("customChange", "Custom Change");
00033     }
00034 
00035     public CustomChange getCustomChange() {
00036         return customChange;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public ClassLoader getClassLoader() {
00040         return classLoader;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader) {
00044         this.classLoader = classLoader;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setClass(String className) throws CustomChangeException {
00048         this.className = className;
00049         try {
00050             customChange = (CustomChange) Class.forName(className, true, getClassLoader()).newInstance();
00051         } catch (Exception e) {
00052             throw new CustomChangeException(e);
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void setParam(String name, String value) {
00057         this.params.add(name);
00058         this.paramValues.put(name, value);
00059     }
00060 
00061 
00062     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00063         SqlStatement[] statements = null;
00064         try {
00065             configureCustomChange();
00066             if (customChange instanceof CustomSqlChange) {
00067                 statements = ((CustomSqlChange) customChange).generateStatements(database);
00068             } else if (customChange instanceof CustomTaskChange) {
00069                 ((CustomTaskChange) customChange).execute(database);
00070             } else {
00071                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException(customChange.getClass().getName() + " does not implement " + CustomSqlChange.class.getName() + " or " + CustomTaskChange.class.getName());
00072             }
00073         } catch (CustomChangeException e) {
00074             throw new UnsupportedChangeException(e);
00075         }
00076 
00077         if (statements == null) {
00078             statements = new SqlStatement[0];
00079         }
00080         return statements;
00081     }
00082 
00083 
00084     public SqlStatement[] generateRollbackStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException, RollbackImpossibleException {
00085         SqlStatement[] statements = null;
00086         try {
00087             configureCustomChange();
00088             if (customChange instanceof CustomSqlRollback) {
00089                 statements = ((CustomSqlRollback) customChange).generateRollbackStatements(database);
00090             } else if (customChange instanceof CustomTaskRollback) {
00091                 ((CustomTaskRollback) customChange).rollback(database);
00092             } else {
00093                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Unknown rollback type: "+customChange.getClass().getName());
00094             }
00095         } catch (CustomChangeException e) {
00096             throw new UnsupportedChangeException(e);
00097         }
00098 
00099         if (statements == null) {
00100             statements = new SqlStatement[0];
00101         }
00102         return statements;
00103 
00104     }
00105 
00106 
00107     public boolean canRollBack() {
00108         return customChange instanceof CustomSqlRollback || customChange instanceof CustomTaskRollback;
00109     }
00110 
00111     private void configureCustomChange() throws CustomChangeException {
00112         try {
00113             for (String param : params) {
00114                 ObjectUtil.setProperty(customChange, param, paramValues.get(param));
00115             }
00116             customChange.setFileOpener(getFileOpener());
00117             customChange.setUp();
00118         } catch (Exception e) {
00119             throw new CustomChangeException(e);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00124         return customChange.getConfirmationMessage();
00125     }
00126 
00127     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00128         Element customElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("custom");
00129         customElement.setAttribute("class", className);
00130 
00131         for (String param : params) {
00132             Element paramElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("param");
00133             paramElement.setAttribute("name", param);
00134             paramElement.setAttribute("value", paramValues.get(param));
00135 
00136             customElement.appendChild(paramElement);
00137         }
00138 
00139         return customElement;
00140     }
00141 
00142     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00143         return null;
00144     }
00145 }
